study_metadata.name: IDITI_Small_Validation_Study
study_metadata.description: Cost-effective IDITI framework validation using 8 key texts to test architectural compliance improvements
study_metadata.hypothesis: IDITI framework demonstrates discriminative validity between dignity and tribalism texts with proper framework boundary compliance (2 wells only)

Production visualization engine signatures are properly embedded
